title: Integrations_connectors v2: Add scheduled refresh job for Salesforce/HubSpot sync

sections.text: Implement a scheduled refresh mechanism for the Salesforce and HubSpot connectors that periodically re-pulls ARR and opportunity records used for issue-to-customer/value linkage. The job should support configurable cadence, incremental sync via updated timestamps where available, and basic backoff/retry to avoid API rate-limit failures. Persist last-successful sync state per connector/account so downstream linkage logic always has fresh inputs.
